sentences.en: A stout, heavy stick, usually thicker at one end, suitable for use a weapon a cudgel.
sentences.cn: 一种坚固 、 沉重的棒, 通常一端粗大, 适于用作武器;短粗的棍棒.

sentences.en: After the doctor knows, cudgel one's brains for recalled a way eventually.
sentences.cn: 医生知道后, 绞尽脑汁终于想出了个办法.

sentences.en: All of a sudden the phantom dealt him a blow with his cudgel.
sentences.cn: 那个鬼突然给他吃了一棍.

sentences.en: Cudgel one's brains for climbs grid , cigarette receives.
sentences.cn: 绞尽脑汁爬格子, 香烟一支接一支.

sentences.en: Each forestry bureau sells fatigued and weak cudgel one's brains for for lumber again.
sentences.cn: 各林业局又为木材销售疲软绞尽脑汁.

sentences.en: Flatter a rascal, the will cudgel you; cudgel a rascal he will lick your boots.
sentences.cn: 奉承恶棍, 会挨棍棒; 痛击恶棍,他会舔靴.

sentences.en: He had a magic golden cudgel and tremendously supernatural power.
sentences.cn: 他拥有一根神奇的金箍棒和高强的武功.

sentences.en: He is a strong man and can pick up the golden cudgel easily.
sentences.cn: 他力气很大,能轻易拿起千钧棒.

sentences.en: He took Cosette by his left hand, and with his right he picked up his cudgel, which was lying on the ground.
sentences.cn: 他用左手牵着珂赛特，用右手从地上拾起他的那根棍棒。

sentences.en: I have been cudgel my brains for detainment you. However, everything is holdthe sun.
sentences.cn: 我曾绞尽脑汁想挽留住你, 可惜这一切只是徒劳.

sentences.en: Is it worthwhile cudgel your brains to find a solution to that puzzle on the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 你这样绞尽脑汁去解决报上的那个智力测验题值得吗?

sentences.en: Monkey wielded his cudgel and hit Ne Zha from Behind . Ne Zha was forced to withdraw.
sentences.cn: 托塔天王李靖见两将俱败, 不能取胜,便急忙鸣金收兵.

sentences.en: Sabreplay , swordplay , spear play and cudgel play all have their own set patterns.
sentences.cn: 刀术 、 剑术 、 枪术以及棍术各有自己的一套套路.

sentences.en: The yellow man carried his bundle and his cudgel in his hand.
sentences.cn: 那个穿黄大衣的人,手里捏着他的棍子和包袱.

sentences.en: Thenardier noted the enormous size of the cudgel and the solitude of the spot.
sentences.cn: 德纳第望着那根粗壮无比的棍棒和那一片荒凉的地方。

sentences.en: there was no one else to &B{take up the cudgels on their behalf}.
sentences.cn: 没有其他人去捍卫他们的利益。

sentences.en: When using loudspeakers, be sure to use your discretion . You can't teach others with a cudgel.
sentences.cn: 使用高音喇叭, 千万要见机行事, 不能授人以柄.

trans.tran_en: a short thick stick used as a weapon
